Title: Good character and scholarship
Notes: Books were presented as a reward, for example for studying the model behaviour of Lei Feng, for being a good member of the Communist Youth League, for helping the elderly. The covers of the books point to contents that no longer focus on politically correct themes, but that are aimed at improving one's self. The fourth book from above, for example, is an "English Course".
Theme: Socialist Spiritual Civilization (1980-2000)To Read Too Many Books is Harmful
